item.title: Boiling, the surest way to purify water
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GPlTGroO6yA MyDirtyOldBoots Published on Oct 2, 2011 The surest way to ensure you have clean drinking water is to boil the water. Put contaminated water in a pail and bring the water to a boil. Leave it boiling for about a minute. At the end of a minute the water will be ready to drink,. Lot of people keep the water boiling for longer. This does not help as the water will not get any hotter, it will only evaporate.
